DOC.HEADLINE: METROPOLITAN DIGEST / LOS ANGELES COUNTY NEWS IN BRIEF : LOS ANGELES ; CITY SETS_UP HOT_LINES FOR DAMAGE INSPECTIONS
DOC.TEXT: The following hot_lines operated by the Los Angeles Department of Building and Safety have been set_up for information related to earthquake damage inspections : * For first inspections of earthquake-damaged buildings not yet evaluated by Building and Safety : ( 800 ) 655-4095 * For questions or disputes about the red , yellow , or green tags posted on buildings after emergency inspections by Building and Safety teams : ( 800 ) 890-0223.Information is also available to help residents interpret when structures are safe to enter or occupy . * For questions about dwellings evaluated as unsafe to occupy , as indicated by a red or yellow tag : ( 800 ) 664-2489 . Information is also available on procedures for obtaining an emergency re-entry for limited retrieval of possessions .
